stable.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.0.9.1230
stable.description:
Addressed numerous bugs and issues in version 9.0.8.1208 for a more stable and reliable experience.

Happy New Year 2024! üéâ

kobe.title: Introducing ImageGlass 8.11 and the new ImageGlass, version 9
kobe.description:
ImageGlass 8.11 is an QoL update to fix Save button function for Crop tool.

ImageGlass 9, a major update three years in the making, brings exciting features for an enhanced photo viewing experience.
‚ö†Ô∏è Note: Some version 8 features ARE NOT available, please read the blog post before upgrading.
